channel.title: [508] I need help with DropItem [508]
channel.description:
Okay so I recently added summoning to my server, and it's the correct version and everything. But now what I'm trying to do is make a basic form of a pet... Now for right now I don't know how to make the pet follow you because I can't even make you drop the pet... So what I need is some help.
Here's my question:
How can I make cases in my DropItem.java file? I can make cases for ItemOption1, just not DropItem... So could someone show me how. Because if they can I can pretty much figure everything else out
